channel.title: CVE Feed for Blue Medicine Labs -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-24301|2024-08-03T19:28:23.464Z -- blue%20medicine%20labs -- hotjar%20connecticator
item.description: The Hotjar Connecticator WordPress plugin through 1.1.1 is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in the 'hotjar script' textarea. The request did include a CSRF nonce that was properly verified by the server and this vulnerability could only be exploited by administrator users.
